contacts.name: Dahao
contacts.signature: Walk slower, don't leave your soul behind.

209990002.text: How do you do? Are there new missions at the Realm-Keeping Commission?

209990003.text: You and the members of the Express crew have been a great help with the many tasks previously entrusted to you. We are deeply grateful for your assistance.

209990004.text: I am reaching out this time to update you, Mr. Yang, and Miss March on some follow-up situations.

209990005.text: Do you remember the previous invitation for you and a few others to come to the Realm-Keeping Commission to identify suspicious individuals?

209990006.text: You mean that time when March played detective, making wild guesses about one traveling merchant's background and whereabouts, but couldn't nail down a single solid answer?

209990007.text: Yep, that's the one. Officer Jingyan even praised Miss March for her keen observation and unorthodox thinking during that incident. She mentioned that Miss March seemed like a natural for our line of work.

209990009.text: It seems you may be too preoccupied elsewhere. I still remember how Miss March deduced the whereabouts of an outworlder back then.

209990010.text: Officer Jingyan even praised Miss March for her keen observation and unorthodox thinking during that incident. She mentioned that Miss March seemed like a natural for our line of work.

209990011.text: Believe it or not, I received an official notice jointly issued by the Ten-Lords Commission and the Cloud Knights. That blond merchant, Luocha, is indeed an unlawful character who infiltrated the Xianzhou!

209990012.text: Miss March's deduction and Mr. Yang's intuition... have come true! The Express Crew truly is a group of hidden talents! Much admiration!

209990015.text: Don't knock it, the official seal and signatures are all there. This is as real as they come.

209990016.text: So what did that man do?

209990017.text: I can't go into the specifics as it's still part of Xianzhou's internal affairs.

209990018.text: But, given our tight relationship, I can spill a bit of the beans for you. The official document states that he was arrested on charges of "identity fraud and smuggling of dangerous bio-merchandise, among other crimes." The use of the expression "among other" is quite intriguing.

209990019.text: Of course, I have received the directive from the Realm-Keeping Commission's general affairs office, requesting to commend and express gratitude to enthusiastic guests such as yourselves.

209990020.text: I would like to express my own gratitude to you all, and deliver to you your well-earned remuneration.

209990021.text: In that case, if there are tasks involving apprehending fugitives or pursuing criminals in the future, I hope you and the Express Crew can continue to make full use of your intuition!

209990022.text: Stay safe, I shall take my leave!
